titleStmt.title: The severall speeches and songs, at the presentment of Mr. Bushells rock to the Qveen's Most Excellent Majesty, Aug. 23. 1636 Her Highnesse being gratiously pleased to honour the said rock, not only with her royall presence, bvt commanded the same to be called after her owne princely name Henrietta.
titleStmt.author: Bushell, Thomas, 1594-1674.
Ives, Simon, 1600-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, and are to be sold by Thomas Allam,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Bushell by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
At end: The music to these songs was compos'd by Symon Ive.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
